Package uk.ac.rhul.cs2800

Class StrStack

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.rhul.cs2800.StrStack
public class StrStack extends Object
A facade used to hide details of the stack class and make it so it only handles Strings.
Author:
bensh

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StrStack()
    A constructor that initialises the basic stack class needed.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isEmpty()
    Used to check if the stack is empty or not.
    String
    pop()
    Returns the String value being stored on top of the stack, unless the stack is empty, if so an error is thrown.
    void
    push(String s)
    Used to push an Entry class storing a passed in String onto a stack.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • StrStack

      public StrStack()
      A constructor that initialises the basic stack class needed.

  • Method Details

    • push

      public void push(String s)
      Used to push an Entry class storing a passed in String onto a stack.
      Parameters:
      s - the passed in String

    • pop

      public String pop() throws BadTypeException
      Returns the String value being stored on top of the stack, unless the stack is empty, if so an error is thrown.
      Returns:
      the String value being stored on top of the stack
      Throws:
      BadTypeException - exception thrown when you try to get the value from an Entry but its storing a different type

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Used to check if the stack is empty or not.
      Returns:
      true if the stack is empty or false if it is not
